Actions.Text: REFERRED TO HOUSING, CONSTRUCTION AND COMMUNITY DEVELOPMENT

Title: Requires rent concessions to be reported to the division of housing and community renewal
Summary: Requires rent concessions to be reported to the division of housing and community renewal; requires the inclusion of a statement of net effective rent for units with concessions; requires certain annual statements filed to include reporting of rent concessions.
LawCode: Amd ยง12-a, Emerg Ten Prot Act of 1974; amd ยง26-517, NYC Ad Cd; amd ยง421-a, RPT L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the emergency tenant protection act of nineteen seventy-four, the administrative code of the city of New York and the real property tax law, in relation to reporting rent concessions
